body.p: To access the online help, which is available at any time while working in , go to Help Help . Alternatively, you can press on your keyboard to display directly the matching help page of the currently focused editor, dialog, or view. If you want the relevant help pages to load automatically as you change the focus, go to Window Show View Dynamic Help or Help Show Dynamic Help View .

The name and version of the third-party libraries and frameworks used by are listed in the About dialog box: Help About Also you can see here the values of system properties like the version of the Java virtual machine, the location of the user home directory, the Java classpath, etc.
